20178.quoteText: We may suspend or terminate your account or cease providing you with all or part of the Services at any time for any or no reason, including, but not limited to, if we reasonably believe you have violated these Terms.

20179.quoteText: MeWe reserves the right to remove objectionable content without notice. MeWe can remove any content or information you post at MeWe if we believe that it violates our Terms of Service.

20181.quoteText: The use of MeWe is for all persons age 16 and over who agree to these Terms of Service.

20182.quoteText: You have the right to delete your account and take your content with you at any time.

20183.quoteText:
Security: HTTPS and Encryption

We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect the confidentiality and security of your personal user data and other information transmitted to us. For example, we encrypt your personally identifiable information, and most, if not all requests from you to the server are created over a secure connection (HTTPS).
20183.title: Information is provided about security practices

tosdr.case: Information is provided about security practices

20184.quoteText: Cookies on MeWe let you log in and out of MeWe without needing to retype your login and password
20184.title: First-party cookies are used

tosdr.case: First-party cookies are used

20185.quoteText: You agree that any action of whatever nature arising from or relating to these Terms, the Site, or Services will be filed only in the state or federal courts located in Los Angeles County, California.
20185.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Los Angeles; California; USA)

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

20186.quoteText: MeWe offers Secret Chat as an option for MeWe users. MeWe has no way to decrypt Secret Chat messages of MeWe users because the messages are end-to-end encrypted and MeWe does not have any knowledge of their private keys. The encrypted messages and media (images, videos etc.) in MeWe Secret Chat are deleted on MeWe servers after they have been delivered successfully.
20186.title: The message in "Secret Chat" are encrypted, and MeWe cannot decrypt it

tosdr.case: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

21619.quoteText:
Right to Erasure

At all times you have an easy way to opt out of our service and delete your account as well as ALL of your Content Data, if you do not wish to continue using our services.

21620.quoteText:
MeWe will only respond to requests from non-U.S.
law enforcement agencies that are issued by a U.S.
court either by way of a mutual legal assistance treaty or a letter rogatory.
21620.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

21621.quoteText: For all MeWe customers disclosure is governed by U.S. law, including the Federal Stored Communications Act (the “SCA”), 18 U.S.C. Sections 2701-2712, as well as by our own Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. In general, we will turn over “basic subscriber” records (i.e., name, email address, phone number, and so on) in response to a valid subpoena that is issued in connection with an official criminal investigation.
